    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_mab_api.UpdateAvailableService</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>UpdateAvailableService</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var UpdateAvailableService = Class.create();
UpdateAvailableService.prototype = {
    initialize: function () {},

    type: "UpdateAvailableService",

    getIsUpdateAvailable: function () {
        const result = {};
        const MOBILE_APP_BUILDER_SCOPE = "sn_mab";
        var appIds = [];
        var storeApp = new GlideRecord("sys_store_app");
        storeApp.addQuery("scope", "CONTAINS", MOBILE_APP_BUILDER_SCOPE);
        storeApp.query();
        while (storeApp.next()) {
            appIds.push(storeApp.getUniqueValue());
        }
        var appsDataApi = new sn_appclient.AppsDataAPI();
        var apps = {};
        if (!appsDataApi) {
            gs.error(gs.getMessage("Unable to instantiate sn_appclient.AppsDataAPI"));
            return null;
        }
        apps = appsDataApi.getEntitledApps(appIds);
        for (var i = 0; i < apps.length; i++) {
            if (!apps[i].isApplication) continue;
            result[apps[i].scope] = {
                isUpdateAvailable: apps[i].isInstalledAndUpdateAvailable,
                newVersion: apps[i].latest_version,
                name: apps[i].name,
                currentVersion: apps[i].version,
            };
        }
        return result;
    },
};
]]></script>
